product_name: Pacific Play Tents Play Tunnel - 4 ft.
long_description: Kids will enjoy hours of fun with the Pacific Play Tents Play Tunnel. The 4 ft. tunnel can be used on its own or to connect with a play tent or homemade blanket fort. Sturdy steel-spring construction; tunnel springs open once you undo the attached rip-and-stick straps. Made of water-repellent polyester; interior padding provides comfort. Set up on soft or smooth surface only; avoid using near a fireplace or open flame. To store, compress tunnel down until it's completely flat; keep pressing while you secure the rip-and-stick straps. Clean with a soft cloth or sponge, cool water and liquid soap. Air dry only.
short_description: Kids will enjoy hours of fun with the Pacific Play Tents Play Tunnel. The 4 ft. tunnel can be used on its own or to connect with a play tent or homemade blanket fort.
